amendment.description: An amendment to provide that none of the funds made available in the bill for reconstruction efforts in Iraq may be used to procure goods or services from any entity that includes information on a response to a Request for Proposal (RFP) that indicates that such entity is organized under the laws of France, Germany, the Russian Federation, or Syria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MN) amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
